name: Pinkie's Diamond Quest
description: Hi, your "Pinkie The Witch" , as you embark on a fun adventure, you will meet a cute shopkeeper he will kiss you everytime you visit his potion shop, you will battle many o' mobs along your perilous journey, you will sail may seas and visit countless amounts of islands all around the vast world, you will have to put your thinking cap to solve puzzles, find treasure, but your quest is to find the Diamond and win the game! So have a blast in this adventure open world jam packed RPG game, and have countless endless fun grinding your way up to defeat the Hoards of Killer Hornets out there! Enjoy, have fun sincerely Sarainia Angelsong
